text: <@U22PU4G4A> I have an idea that certainly already has been submitted : Make Global Variable available :slightly_smiling_face: :slightly_smiling_face: :slightly_smiling_face:
I need to use a variable defined in a loop outside but I can’t... It’s quite difficult to execute some custom features with COS
<@U3TR96G84> have you tried defining your var outside the loop, then inside the loop just change its value?

If we are talking about ideas:
- Design Manager Edit Footer Option
  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Design-Manager-Edit-Footer-Option/idi-p/17518>

- Allow changing text color of LeadFlow (and let us mark fields as required)
  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-for-changing-color-of-LeadFlow-text/idi-p/18250>
